After dinner we'll be opening the floor to anyone who wishes to share a toast, memory or story.

Nic and Emma

Emma Suzanne Henry, born in Brantford Ontario, and Nicolas Robin Durish, born in Toronto Ontario, met on their first day of their Undergraduate Degrees at the University of Guelph. After months of close friendship, they started dating in November of 2012 and proceeded to finish their degrees, plant over 800,000 trees in Northern Ontario, hike the West-Coast trail, build a tiny-home in a school bus and travel in it across Canada, work as ski-bums on Vancouver Island, buy a home, and parent the best 5 chickens and dog a couple could ask for.

Your Stay In Belleville


Transportation & Parking

To get to the event grounds, we've left details below on a parking lot that we've reserved down the street as well as taxi contact details. To get home at the end of the night, we'll have a shuttle van available and as many taxi's as we can wrangle to shuttle people back to their beds. If you drove to the event, feel free to leave your car overnight, and return for it the next day :)

Parking

We've reserved parking spaces at the Bayside Oral Surgery Centre, just up on the road on the corner of Bridge & Chatham. These spaces need to be vacated by Sunday at 2:00pm, so please be sure to return for your car before then. If spaces fill up, there is lots of street parking on adjacent streets, and a number of businesses on Dundas that are a short walk away.

Taxis

For anyone who has experienced Belleville Taxis before, they can be a bit... inconsistent. We recommend reserving your cab and arriving a bit early, just in case.

Central Taxi:
(613) 962-5353

Bluebird Taxi:
(613) 962-2525


Accomodations

This block has now been released. There still might be rooms - just not under "Nic and Emma" :(. We strongly encourage making a reservations as soon as possible and considering transportation to the wedding grounds.

Holiday Inn Express

There are rooms with 1 King or 2 Queens available with complementary breakfasts and access to the hottub, pool and gym.

291 N Front St, Belleville
(613) 962-1200
"Durish & Henry Wedding"
Booking Date: July 12

AirBnB

There is a ton of AirBnB selection and variety in the region. Grab a house/room in town or check out the cottages in Prince edward County.

Belleville

Prince Edward County

Tent

If you don't mind rolling out your therm-a-rest, we've got space to accomodate tents in the back of the wedding venue. Though, keep in mind space might be tight, and some individuals may need to wait until midnight to set up their tents in the main event area.

Other

There are several ol' fashion B&Bs in the neighbourhood or other hotels around town to choose from!

Hotels

Bed & Breakfasts


Food & Drink


We’ll be hosting a picnic-style dinner featuring a multitude of dishes from two local caterers, as well as some salads and deserts made by some of our close family and friends! There will be a variety of dishes that suit everyones tastes and diets.

Guapo's Cantina

Servin’ up fresh, scratch made TexMex streetfood. Guapo’s Cantina will be catering an awesome taco bar featuring 3 different types of tacos: Pork Carnitas, Chipotle Chicken and Sweet Potato with a side of Roasted Corn Salad.

Idle Wild

Idle Wild cooks up a variety of fusion cuisine, from Asian, Filipino to classic Canadian dishes. They will be serving Chicken Yakitori (charcoal grilled skewers), Pulled Pork Sliders, Vegetarian Soba Noodles with a side of Cucumber Sambal Salad and Classic Potato Salad.

Beverages

During our cocktail hour and with dinner there will be wine and beer available. After dinner, the bar will open up and begin tapping kegs, serving wine and mixing classic highballs. Don’t worry, it is indeed an open bar ;)

Music


Jam Session

Music is better when shared! There are a lot of musical folks in attendance who we'd love to hear, which is why after we finish with toasts, we're having a good ol' fashion Jam Session. We'll be saving a number of our favourite sing-a-longs for the end, so don't lose your voices too early ;) There will be a sign-up sheet at the event so please don't hesitate to bring a musical instrument and play us a song - either solo or with a group, your own words or a cover, serious or silly!

Long Range Hustle

The evening will conclude with songs and dance led by Long Range Hustle. A mix of high school and summer camp counsellor tenures brought the core of this southern Ontario five-piece together - Paul Brogee, Mike Brogee (Nic’s cousins!), Jay Foster, AJ Fisico and Ryan Pritchard. We can’t wait to fill the backyard up with the infectious energy, driving rhythms, gorgeous melodies and down-right dance-tastic music that LRH brings.

RSVP

Please only reserve seats for the individual(s) indicated in your invitation. We are sincerely sorry that we are unable to accommodate more guests and plus ones at the event.

To RSVP send us an email at wedding@nicandemma.ca indicating party members and dietary restrictions, or fill out the following form.


Registry

We are honored you will share in our special day - your presence is our gift! We're lucky to already have a home full of many of the things we need. However if you'd like to contribute funds to help with the cost of the wedding, honeymoon or student debts, we will be accepting gifts at the event.
Thank you!
